About yours truly

Hi, I'm Daniel Frisch. I am a professional multi-disciplined Web Applications Developer based in Cincinnati, Ohio. By day, I build and maintain websites and mobile applications for those in need of ninja-esque coding skills. By night, I enjoy playing music with friends, spending time with family, and riding motorcycles.

You can view my sorce codes and other projects at my GITHUB account and my CODEPEN page.
